name: Sumo Zombie Dreams
description: Sumo Zombie Dreams is a game where you play as a scientist who somehow created zombies, and the  zombies are not happy with her. To make things worse, the lab has been lifted out of the building, and the lab floor has become icy from the altitude. Despite this, the zombies won't stop attacking. The scientist's goal is clear; push the zombies off before they can get to her.
